Jiraiya strikes the opponent repeatedly with one fist while hopping on one leg and then appears behind them to strike them with his palm sending them falling to the ground and finishes by slamming his heel on them.

==Trivia==
* The first half of this technique is reminiscent of the [[Drunken Fist]] style.
